Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1974...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Boston (UBA) on 2/24/1974 (Going to PIL: P J. Zwick. Going to SHP: P B. Opperman)...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Coney Island on 7/8/1984 (Going to PIL: P J. Moon, SS E. Mcinerney. Going to CI: P G. Figuera, P A. Saad, P J. Zwick, P D. Kleiber)...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1985...
Injured on 6/6/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/16/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $1,828,700 per year...
Injured on 8/10/1991 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
